titleStmt.title: Daniel W. Lindsey to E. K. Owsley
CWG13958

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 10 ; 10 Feb - 16 March 1865

body.p:
397
March 13th 5
E K. Owsley Esq
Mammoth Cave Ky.
Sir

Your communication of the 9th inst to his Excellency Gov. Bramlette has been referred to this office. It is not deemed advisable to raise any more State troops at the present time. If in future we determine to raise more troops the claims of Captn Miles & Davis will be considered.

Very Respectfully
D, W, Lindsey
Adj Genl Ky
